00075 typedef enum scbs_err_status
00076 {
00077         SCBS_ERR_NONE,                                                                  /* No error                                     */
00078         SCBS_ERR_ADDRESS_ERROR,                                                 /* Invalid address                      */
00079         SCBS_ERR_TRANSFER_ERROR,                                                /* Error during transfer        */
00080         SCBS_ERR_BUS_ERROR,                                                             /* Error on the bus                     */
00081         SCBS_ERR_BUS_INACTIVE                                                   /* Bus inactive                         */
00082 
00083 }       SCBS_eErrorStatus;

00146 typedef struct
00147 {
00148         /* SCBS Block Index */
00149         unsigned long           ui32BlockIndex;
00150 
00151         /* SCBS address base (7 or 10 bit) */
00152         unsigned long           ui32SlaveAddressBase;
00153 
00154         /* SCBS address mask (7 or 10 bit) */
00155         unsigned long           ui32SlaveAddressMask;
00156 
00157         /* SCBS bit rates (in KHz) */
00158         unsigned long           ui32BitRate;
00159 
00161         unsigned long           ui32CoreClock;
00162 
00164         unsigned long           ui32BusDelayNS;
00165 
00166 } SCBS_PARAM_T;

00191                                    unsigned char *buffer,
00192                                    unsigned long num_bytes_to_transfer,
00193                                    unsigned long status);

00209 } SCBS_CALLBACK_T;

00218 typedef struct scbs_io_block_t
00219 {
00221     KRN_POOLLINK;
00222 
00224     QIO_IOCB_T      iocb;

00227     SCBS_CALLBACK_T callback;

00237 typedef struct scbs_async_t
00238 {
00241     int                    forget;
00242 
00244     SCBS_CALLBACKROUTINE_T *callback_routine;
00245 
00247     void                   *callback_context;
00248 
00249 } SCBS_ASYNC_T;
00250 
00252 #define SCBS_ASYNC_GET_RESULT(async, context) \
00253     { (async)->forget = 0;                     \
00254       (async)->callback_context = context; }
00255 
00257 #define SCBS_ASYNC_FORGET(async) \
00258     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00259       (async)->callback_routine = NULL; }
00260 
00263 #define SCBS_ASYNC_CALLBACK(async, routine, context) \
00264     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00265       (async)->callback_routine = routine; \
00266       (async)->callback_context = context; }
